name: CADD Drawing Review
description: CADD standards and drawing quality review - can be preliminary or final

items.text: Run spell check on each sheet
Check north arrow rotation, bar scale, and scale listed in title block match each other
Check overall drawing appearance for missing layers, overlapping text, misplaced text & leaders, overall readability
Check boring & coring log
Check that Excel table sheet numbers are correct
Check for labels on centerline stations, contours, streets, bodies of water, etc.
Check for project outline on location map
Check for P.O.B. & P.O.E. on location map
Check index of sheets for matching page numbers & titles
Check that the total number of sheets is correct everywhere it is listed
Check that current title block is in use (Aerial and Simplex fonts only)
Standard plan note should reference current MDOT standard specs
Check for the Miss Dig note and 811 graphic
Check each section's road name and stationing against plan sheets
Check that cross sections are drawn to scale
Check that there is a standard plan legend and that the line types are displaying correctly
Check all details for uniformity (text size, dimension style, etc.)
Check that sheet number outline matches corresponding sheet, if applicable
Check that benchmarks are present. Check that text matches survey notes
Verify phasing areas, if applicable
Check for P.O.B & P.O.E.
Check that all existing manholes, gate valves/vaults, and fire hydrants are numbered
Check that hatch scale and angle match legend
Do a spot check on quantities
Check that structures are logically numbered and notes in plan match notes in profile. Curb catch basin labels should show 'EM' grade rather than 'RIM'. Do a spot sanity check on inverts
Check that benchmarks and buried utility caution notes are present where applicable
Check match line and 'see sheet' notes for correct sheet numbers
Check that hatch legend matches the hatches in use in style, scale, and rotation
Check that profile vertical scale is correct and that data bands have been mapped
Do a spot check on quantities
Spot check that RIM/EM grades match proposed surface or grading plan
Check spot grades for blank or default text
Check that all pipes and utilities are hidden in viewport. Storm and sanitary manholes should be visible
Check RIM/EM grades with Plan/Profile sheet to match
Check that legend matches the plan
Do a sanity check on all signs (if you were driving, do they make sense)
Do a spot check on quantities
Check that legend includes all soil keys used
Do a spot check on quantities
